name: Grimace
tagline: grimace is a fluent regular expression string builder for Python
body:
# what is grimace?
Grimace is a fluent way to generate regular expression strings.  It was inspired by the following:
* I use regular expressions often enough to know most of the syntax, but infrequently enough to never be able to remember the details
* An article in Dr Dobbs journal [about using the C/C++ preprocessor to make it easier to write regular expressions](http://www.drdobbs.com/embedded-systems/irregular-expressions/240157655#)
* A vague interest in fluent syntax and how one might implement such things in a Python/functional way
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
